welcome: Welcome to the Strava Activity Reader
connectPrompt: Click the button below to connect your Strava account and see your activities.
noGpsData: No GPS data available to display for this activity.
syncVideoHelp: Upload a video file to find its starting point on the map. The video must contain creation date metadata.
videoDateMismatchError: The video's creation date is outside of this activity's time range. Please check if you selected the correct file.
